description.narrative: Furtherance of UNICEF global focus and change initiatives on increased accountability, Enterprise Risk Management, promote coherence and harmonization of business practices in operations across UNICEF IRAQ Country Office., which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Field/Country Office Oversight, Management And Operations Support, Technical Leadership For Programme Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Girls, boys, families and communities assessed with humanitarian needs due to crisis have access to goods and services in education, nutrition & health, child protection, Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH) and social protection to save lives and assist recovery through proven cost-effective participatory interventions focused on the rights of the child, and equity and gender considerations.

mailing-address.narrative: C/o UNICEF Amman P.O. Box 1551 Amman 11821

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Furtherance of UNICEF global focus and change initiatives on increased accountability, Enterprise Risk Management, promotecoherence and harmonization of business practices in operations across UNICEF IRAQ Country Office.
